verbose_text: CPE-NFalpha1-DeltaN (40 kD variant), but not CPE-NFalpha1 (Xiao, our unpublished data) was found to significantly up-regulate expression of four genes, fibroblast growth factor 2 (FGF2), insulin like growth factor binding protein2 (IGFBP2), death associated protein (DAP1), and EphrinA1 in HT22, a hippocampal cell line and in primary mouse cortical neurons.
evidence: expression of four genes, fibroblast growth factor 2
